tool_description: Real time retrieval of email, phone, address, website, etc. data made available on a company's public facebook page. The data is pulled the moment it's requested, and it's pulled in a CCPA and GDPR compliant way. A 10% discount relative to the plans available here is available through my site: https://companydataapi.webflow.io/
name: Facebook Company Data
title: Facebook Company Data

api_list.name: FB Company Data from FB Url
api_list.description: Retrieves email, phone number, address, website, and other data from the about section of a company's Facebook page.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://facebook-company-data.p.rapidapi.com/fbAboutData"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "facebook-company-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

print(response.json())

api_list.name: FB Company Data from Company Url
api_list.description: Use this when you don't know or don't want to lookup the url of the company's facebook page, but have the url of the company's website. The api will go through various fallbacks to search for the company's facebook page, and if it is found, will return data from that company's facebook page.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://facebook-company-data.p.rapidapi.com/getFBUrl"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "facebook-company-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Facebook Company Pages from Keyword Search
api_list.description:
Returns a list of up to 20 facebook pages, including a partial page title, short description, and facebook url for each result returned. All google search operators are permitted (full list here: https://moz.com/learn/seo/search-operators), for example if you were searching for facebook pages related to the keyword "beauty":

intext:beauty
inurl:beauty,
intitle:beauty
allintitle:beauty salon
beauty -salon
"beauty salon"
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://facebook-company-data.p.rapidapi.com/getFBUrlsFromKeyword"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "facebook-company-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
